faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flats For Sale in sector 78 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get quick and detailed answers to the most common queries buyers have about residential properties investment potential and market dynamics in sector 78

faqs.question: What are the common configurations available for a Flat For Sale in sector 78
faqs.answer: Sector 78 offers a wide range of flat configurations primarily 2 BHK 3 BHK and 4 BHK units catering to various family sizes and budgetary requirements. The 3 BHK segment is the most popular choice offering a perfect balance of space and affordability often ranging from 1200 sq ft to 1800 sq ft. There are also smaller 1 BHK and studio apartments in specific residential projects suitable for single occupants or pure investment purposes seeking maximum rental returns in the sector 78 micro-market.

faqs.question: Is sector 78 considered a good location for long-term real estate investment
faqs.answer: Absolutely Sector 78 is highly recommended for long-term investment due to its location on the growth corridor of Greater Gurugram and strong infrastructure development. The consistent demand for residential property driven by excellent connectivity to Gurgaon and nearby industrial zones ensures strong capital appreciation over the next five to ten years. Furthermore the development of social amenities like schools and hospitals solidifies its appeal as a sustainable residential hub.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 78 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3 BHK flat in sector 78 varies significantly based on the builder project quality amenity package and construction status ready-to-move versus under-construction. Generally prices for a mid-segment 3 BHK unit start around INR 55 Lacs and can go up to INR 90 Lacs or more for luxury apartments in high-end complexes. It is advisable to consult our property experts for the most current and specific pricing based on your desired project specifications.

faqs.question: Are there any ready-to-move options for flats in sector 78 or only under-construction projects
faqs.answer: Sector 78 has a healthy mix of both ready-to-move inventory and ongoing under-construction projects. Many prominent developers have successfully delivered their phases providing excellent ready-to-move flats with immediate possession. Buying a ready-to-move Flat For Sale in sector 78 eliminates waiting time and construction risk allowing instant occupancy and rental income generation if applicable.

faqs.question: How is the connectivity of sector 78 to Gurgaon and other NCR regions
faqs.answer: Connectivity is one of the strongest selling points of Sector 78. It offers swift access to the Gurgaon-Mathura Road NH-19 and is strategically located near the upcoming FNG Expressway extension. This ensures quick travel to major parts of Gurgaon NCR including Noida and Gurugram. Additionally its proximity to existing and planned metro stations significantly eases the commute for daily travelers.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect in the apartment complexes of sector 78
faqs.answer: Modern residential complexes offering a Flat For Sale in sector 78 are generally equipped with a comprehensive list of premium amenities. These typically include 24/7 high-level security surveillance power backup facilities dedicated basement or stilt parking clubhouses swimming pools fitness centers and children's play areas. Many luxury projects also feature indoor sports facilities and extensive green landscapes.

faqs.question: Do I need to pay Goods and Services Tax GST on purchasing a Flat For Sale in sector 78
faqs.answer: GST applicability depends entirely on the status of the property. If you purchase a ready-to-move Flat For Sale where the Completion Certificate CC has been issued you are exempt from paying GST. However if you purchase an under-construction flat GST will be applicable on the property cost typically at a reduced rate if certain criteria are met such as affordable housing status.

faqs.question: Are the properties in sector 78 RERA registered and legally verified
faqs.answer: Yes all reputable and legally compliant residential projects offering a Flat For Sale in sector 78 Gurugram must be registered under the Real Estate Regulatory Authority RERA. We prioritize listings that are RERA compliant ensuring transparency accountability and consumer protection. We encourage all buyers to check the RERA status and documentation before finalizing any purchase.

faqs.question: What are the common maintenance charges for flats in this sector
faqs.answer: Maintenance charges vary based on the project's size density and the level of amenities provided. For a standard 3 BHK Flat For Sale in sector 78 maintenance fees usually range between INR 2.5 to INR 4.5 per square foot per month. This covers common area electricity security landscaping lift operations and general upkeep of the society.

faqs.question: Can non-residents or NRIs easily purchase a Flat For Sale in sector 78 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes NRIs are permitted and actively encouraged to invest in residential property in sector 78 subject to FEMA regulations. The purchase process is straightforward and we offer dedicated legal assistance to guide NRIs through documentation fund repatriation and regulatory compliance ensuring a hassle-free investment in their desired Flat For Sale.
